# cloudflare_certificate_pack (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_certificate_pack" "example_certificate_pack" {
  zone_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
  certificate_pack_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
}
```
